Hanoi club jam before the profile kind of AFC Champions League 2017
After finish around 4 F. League Game, the coach chu family serious once was on his way to Hong Kong in preparation for battle profile kind of AFC Champions League 2017 meet host kitchee sc. But football team not only capital hr absence for upcoming match but also met many other difficulties before step to Hong Kong.
Freedom time closing steak accompanied by being overwhelmed by the airport as the airline, move move of capital football team has been long and very hard work when the plane was delay should armies of coach chu family ATTENTION RIGHT UNTIL 2 a.m. local time day 24/01's face hotel courty yard Marriott.
So capital football team will have a yard. Even in d same day 24/01, this is the only session instead of the initial plan was for 02 l of Hanoi fc before entering the game with Kitchee Sc on 20:00 local day 25/01.
It's not just some idle time glow and coach in Hong Kong, coach chu family serious too acute shortage of forces in this game. After the game ended with tp. Ho Chi Minh, except to quarterback. Moses is still joining the national team again so striker loris has to go back to France meet for the family. Besides Chengliang met a concussion after the game so had to reject the plan at home didn't go to the same team as expected. Out of work to rock to 3 Games / 1 weeks has been eroding the no less can power the whole football team and especially main striker Hoàng VÅ© Samson have signs to load when you still haven't fully recovered Concussion. Powers out on the field in this game of lightning is being put down. So, capital football team was snow want fight very hard first team host kitchee sc
Statement about the upcoming profile type, coach chu family serious: " last year we also have life compared with fc kitchee on the row Ä‘áº«y also in the game kind of AFC Champions League and win they gonna be tight 1-0. Time He forces teams are pretty balanced, but this year team host kitchee sc has prepared a good place for this tournament with forces enhanced and additional quality so this will be a battle Very difficult but we'll be determined to fight and do our best "
If win on kitchee club qualification, Hanoi football team will continue to see fight club ulsan Hyundai (Korea) during play-off on the 7/2th, and they have to continue to win so I can be at Round Table AFC Champions League 2017. In Case didn't pass this confrontation, home assist v. League will be down in a fight at the game AFC Cup 2017, an arena character is just range with cup in this situation.

Key Players

Huang Yang, Kitchee
Since joining the club for the 2011-12 season, Hong Kong midfielder Huang Yang has consistently been among the first names on the team sheet for Kitchee, chalking up more minutes played than any other Kitchee outfielder over the last six seasons. A graduate from Shanghai Shenhua’s youth academy, the 33-year-old former Hong Kong Footballer of the Year may not be much of a goal-threat due to his role as a defensive midfielder, but his work-rate and consistency for Kitchee are a major force behind the club’s success. Huang is complimented by captain Lo Kwan-yee, another ever-present at club-level and for the Hong Kong representative side, while Kitchee’s signing of vastly experienced former Zenit St Petersburg and Korea Republic defender Kim Dong-jin could be an inspired addition.
